```{r}
setwd("/Users/jrutsohn/Desktop/Spring 2020 Texts/BIOS 735/bank-additional")
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
library(psych)

data.test <- read.csv("bank-additional-full.csv",header=T,sep=';')


pairs.panels(data.test[,-c(2:10,13,15,21)])

describe(data.test[,-c(2:10,13,15,21)])
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=job))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=marital))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=education))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=default))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=housing))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=loan))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=contact))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=month))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=day_of_week))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=poutcome))
ggplot(data=data.test) + geom_bar(aes(x=y))
```
